CarrotGarden_Npc_Kakariko006_Water_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Are you watering Steen's carrots?


<sp:3:0:2:0000>So you're a highly skilled fighter and
make time to help others in this way too.
Very impressive.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Still, Steen knows his carrots better than
anyone, and you can count on us to
handle things here.
PumpkinGarden_Npc_Kakariko006_Water_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Are you watering my pumpkins?


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_01>Ha! Thank you.<sp:5:0:0> I can see why a highly
skilled fighter like you would want to
check up on my fortified pumpkins.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But I am a master when it comes to
working in these gardens. You can rely
on me to take care of this.
CarrotGarden_Npc_Kakariko006_Water_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Are you watering Steen's carrots?


<sp:3:0:2:0000>So you're a highly skilled fighter and
make time to help others in this way too.
Very impressive.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But the rain here often helps our garden
work. You can leave the rest to us.
PumpkinGarden_Npc_Kakariko006_Water_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Are you watering my pumpkins?


<sp:3:0:2:0000>So you're a highly skilled fighter and
make time to help others in this way too.
Very impressive.
But the rain here often helps our garden
work. You can leave the rest to us.
talk24: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkDeny_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Steen and I stand united for this village.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
ReturnHome_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Oh... It's you.<sp:0:4:0>I don't usually see folks in here, other
than Steen or my wife.<sp:0:4:0>Wasn't expecting anyone else in my
own home.
talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you want a fortified pumpkin, buy it
at Trissa's store. Steen sold her on the
idea of selling my pumpkins there.
ReturnHome_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Oh... It's you. <sp:5:0:0>You shouldn't make people
jump like that.
talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't sell my fortified pumpkins here.
Buy them at Trissa's store.
talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>I'm sure if he wasn't around, I wouldn't
have figured out that new <clr:0000>method of
attacking while defending<clr:ffff>.
I can't believe I didn't get along with him
until now. What a shame.

A lad like you has likely mastered all
there's to know about battle.

But I'd be glad to show you the <clr:0000>secret
technique <clr:ffff>I came up with, if you're
interested.
talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Trissa sells my pumpkins now at her <clr:0000>store<clr:ffff>,
and that makes me want to work extra
hard in my field.
Steen is helping me too. I appreciate
all of the support.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>And I know that I would have never come
up with that <clr:0000>method of attacking while
defending <clr:ffff>without him.
A lad like you has surely mastered all
there's to know about battle.

But I'd be glad to share that new method
of ours if you're interested.
talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Trissa has more than pumpkins in her
store. Stock up on ingredients there
anytime you head out of our village.
talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's the usual time I help Steen with
his field.
talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>The fortified pumpkin has the effect
of <clr:0000>making you tougher<clr:ffff>.

If you use them in your cooking, the
dishes will increase your defense.

I used to ask my old lady to cook up
those dishes so I could eat some of
that every day.
talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm glad to work hard with Steen so
that Trissa has an easier time stocking
up her <clr:0000>store<clr:ffff>.
talk32:
That's an impressive pumpkin. You might
be reprimanded if you take it.
talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I got a lot done in my field too, thanks
to Steen's help.
talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>You're the lad who helped us defeat
those monsters! I have to thank you for
bringing a geezer like me to my senses.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I talked everything out with Steen, and I
understand now that he's just a bold sort.
Charges ahead. Makes his own way.
We spend our hours discussing the
merits of pumpkins—and of carrots, of
course.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>By the way, during our talks, Steen and I
came up with <clr:0000>a method of attacking
while defending<clr:ffff>.
A lad like you has probably mastered
all there's to know about battle.

But I'd be glad to share our method
with you if you're interested.
Talk_Greeting_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, what did you need at this time of
the day?
talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That idea that Steen and I came up
with, that whole <clr:0000>method of attacking
while defending<clr:ffff>...
It's probably not interesting to a lad like
you, who's mastered all there is to know
about battle.
But I'd be glad to show you the <clr:0000>secret
technique <clr:ffff>I came up with, if you're
curious.
Talk_Greeting_04: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, what did you need, out in this rain?
Talk_Greeting_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Why are you wearing that awful mask?


It'd be a good idea to remove that while
in this village. If you mean it as some sort
of joke, some will not find it funny.
talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>Normally, you'd use a shield only for
defense, right? And you can't use it to
attack.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Or CAN you? You see, if you <clr:0000>attach a
weapon to a shield<clr:ffff>, you can then defend
and attack at the same time.
Steen and I think it'd be worth trying
out with <clr:0000>monster horns <clr:ffff>and<clr:0000> rocks<clr:ffff>. Good
thing we got to talking.
We believe that, if you really run with
this idea, it opens up a whole bunch of
interesting possibilities.
talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL_01>Ha! All this talk is probably just a lot of
blather to a skilled fighter like you.
talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>Keeping an open mind can lead to
attaching new ideas to your old ones, and
that's more impressive in the end.
So, attacking while defending—who knew
that was possible. Yet it is, if you <clr:0000>attach
a weapon to your shield<clr:ffff>.
Steen and I are still working on this
method and hope to test it out with
<clr:0000>monster horns <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>rocks<clr:ffff>.
Who'd have thought that two opinionated
old geezers like us could put aside our
differences to talk about battle.
talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>You shouldn't wear that awful mask in
this village. Not many of us would find
it funny in the least.
